# relative-time



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

A component shows relative time by given timestamp in Date format

## Properties

| Property                 | Attribute | Description | Type   | Default     |
| ------------------------ | --------- | ----------- | ------ | ----------- |
| `timestamp` _(required)_ | --        |             | `Date` | `undefined` |
